description: Support Vector Machine hyperparameter search space

C.notes: Log scale.  Smaller C = stronger regularization. Typical: 0.1-10.

kernel.notes: linear: fast, for linearly separable data; rbf: most common; poly: rarely used

gamma.notes: Log scale. Higher gamma = more complex decision boundary. Auto = 1/n_features.

degree.description: Degree of polynomial kernel (only for poly kernel)
degree.notes: Only used when kernel='poly'. Higher degree = more complex.

num_pca_components.description: Number of PCA components for dimensionality reduction
num_pca_components.notes: Range is dataset-specific. Set in default_config.yaml or auto-detected.
